question: How does the referral data from our force area compare to that of other force areas?
sql:
WITH DailyReferrals AS (
  SELECT 
    CONVERT(DATE, r.ReferralCreatedDateTime) AS ReferralDate,
    COUNT(*) AS NumberOfReferrals,
    p.Name AS PoliceForceName,
    pl.Name AS PoliceForceLocationName
  FROM Referrals r
  JOIN PoliceForceLocations pl ON r.Id = pl.Id
  JOIN PoliceForces p ON pl.PoliceForceId = p.Id
  WHERE 
    r.ReferralCreatedDateTime >= '2023-10-01' AND
    r.ReferralCreatedDateTime < '2023-10-06'
  GROUP BY 
    CONVERT(DATE, r.ReferralCreatedDateTime),
    p.Name,
    pl.Name
)
SELECT
  ReferralDate,
  NumberOfReferrals,
  PoliceForceName,
  PoliceForceLocationName
FROM DailyReferrals
ORDER BY ReferralDate;

FROM DailyReferrals
ORDER BY ReferralDate;

question: Can you compare the number of referrals in this force to those in other regions?
sql:
WITH DailyReferrals AS (
  SELECT 
    CONVERT(DATE, r.ReferralCreatedDateTime) AS ReferralDate,
    COUNT(*) AS NumberOfReferrals,
    p.Name AS PoliceForceName,
    pl.Name AS PoliceForceLocationName
  FROM Referrals r
  JOIN PoliceForceLocations pl ON r.Id = pl.Id
  JOIN PoliceForces p ON pl.PoliceForceId = p.Id
  WHERE 
    r.ReferralCreatedDateTime >= '2023-10-01' AND
    r.ReferralCreatedDateTime < '2023-10-06'
  GROUP BY 
    CONVERT(DATE, r.ReferralCreatedDateTime),
    p.Name,
    pl.Name
)
SELECT
  ReferralDate,
  NumberOfReferrals,
  PoliceForceName,
  PoliceForceLocationName
FROM DailyReferrals
ORDER BY ReferralDate;
